name: places/ChIJ0dVHoBRawokRgbrPq2vhIxc
formattedAddress: 10 South St, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 10 South St, New York, NY 10004-1939, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chic quarters in an elegant luxury hotel on the riverfront offering a private members club & a spa.

originalText.text:
I stayed at this hotel during Thanksgiving with my wife and 4-year-old daughter. Initially concerned about its child-friendliness, I was pleasantly surprised. The customer service was exceptional, and the staff was incredibly warm and friendly to my daughter, making her experience truly magical.

Check-in was smooth, and thanks to AMEX, I received a room upgrade and several amenities. Having stayed at numerous "5-star hotels" recently, I can confidently say that Casa Cipriani is a genuine 5-star establishment, truly deserving of its prestige. It flawlessly combines timeless elegance and sophisticated style.

We loved our stay so much that we extended it for an extra day. The restaurant and in-room dining were outstanding. After seeing how much my daughter enjoyed the tiny jars of jam at breakfast, room service surprised us with a tray of assorted jams and toast, making her feel so special.

Without a doubt, this will be our top choice for New York stays. We're eagerly anticipating our next visit!

originalText.text: Every member of the hotel staff was amazing and accommodating. The club was a totally different story. The wait staff was terrible the food was worse. The glassware for drinks looks like they are from ikea. Got served an espresso martini in a champagne glass and another time in a non stem wine glass. The steak tartar looked and tasted like it was a thawed out hamburger from costco. The staff was uneducated about service in general. A 1/2 empty jazz room we were told we needed to offer apps and main course at the same time. Different story in the main dining room. I would definitely stay at the hotel again but was embarrassed that this is one of the most exclusive private clubs in NYC.

originalText.text: I had the pleasure of staying at Casa Cipriani for a night and I must say, the service was absolutely exceptional! From my initial phone call on Tuesday with Jason, where I mentioned we were celebrating a birthday, to the champagne and cake awaiting us in our room, every detail was executed with care and thoughtfulness. As we made our way to the 5th floor, the service provided by Mya and Jasmine was truly outstanding. I can't stop raving about the incredible experience and the impeccable service at Casa Cipriani!

originalText.text: We thought the hotel was spectacular. The service, cleanliness, the outlets such as the spa and dining rooms were outstanding!  We thought the staff was very friendly and hands on.  We utilized room service which was fast and delicious. We used the butler service and the spa. Most of alll the nightlife at the bar was a lot of fun.  Look forward to returning.

originalText.text: One of the most elegant places in NYC. From the rooms to the spa to the restaurant. All tremendous. Even the Jazz room is always popping. The food is 5/5. The service is 5/5. Hands down one of the greater membership club in New York City.
